name: Redesign Challenge
description: One of the ways I like to level up my design skills is by redesigning websites that I think could be improved. This challenge is a redesign of 3 different websites that I think could use a design refresh.

name: Nouncil
description: A council of Nounish builders working within the framework of NounsDAO to proliferate CC0 and nounish culture.

name: Game Engine
description: When building my portfolio I wanted to include different 2D games. I quickly realized that I was repeating a lot of code and that I should create a standard foundation for each game.

name: Nouns Esports
description: Driving innovation at the intersection of web3 and gaming. Nouns is a decentralized esports organization where anyone, anywhere can contribute towards its growth and success!

name: I'm Feeling Nounish
description: Inspired by The Useless Web and Google's "I'm feeling lucky" button, this project is a fun way for people to discover new nounish people, places and things!

name: Pocket Wallet
description: During my journey of exploring the world of web3 I noticed the alarming amount of terrible user experiences when it came to wallets. Few felt easy to pick up and learn as a beginner and many also felt too technical, giving me way more information than I cared to see. Pocket Wallet is my attempt at fixing these issues.
